cont.entity_a: Rough adjustment release lock is under the collar lock and a pain to adjust. Fine adjustment sticks. Body does not slide smoothly in the collar. Easy to depth adjust. Base was very hard to adjust. Easy to adjust height without taking it out of the table. Good adjustment accuracy. Easy depth adjustment.
Smooth operation. Smooth and powerful. Smooth, quiet, and starts up gently.
Requires bearing replacement occasionally. Prone to vertical adjustment issues due to wood dust. Retainer snap ring on the vertical adjustment shaft has broken twice.
Powerful, quiet, and versatile. Capable of producing 2.25 HP of mechanical energy. Rated at 2.25 HP but feels more powerful.
Soft start feature is softer than older models. Soft start and variable speed features. Soft start and variable speed are great features.
Router was easy to install and fit perfectly on the router table base. Fits the Kreg insert perfectly.
cont.entity_b: Installation is simple with provided instructions. Easy to set up. Easy to set up if no online gaming or consistent connectivity is needed. Easy to set up manually. Compact design and easy installation. Easy to set up and use.
Attractive price with rebate. Reasonable price.

cont.entity_a: High quality compared to other brands. Good build quality. Well made with plenty of power. Good quality product.

cont.entity_b: Router reboots every few hours, even when there is no traffic. Router drops wireless connection about once per hour. Router cannot configure any wireless channel but 6. Signal strength and quality is very inconsistent. Router frequently disconnects from all computers. Router reboots and takes up to 5 minutes to establish a connection. Occasional dropped connections. Router disconnects frequently while online. No problems connecting or maintaining wireless connection.

Signal strength sustains until about 50 meters away. Strong signals throughout the whole house. Good range and speed. Good range and easy to configure security. Deadspots in some areas. Works well throughout the house. Good for short distances.

cont.entity_a: Speed controller is failing after very little use. Variable speed is great for different size bits and types of wood. Adjustable speed. Speed control is easy to reach.
cont.entity_b: Main item description is misleading about data transfer speed. Stable connection speed of 108 Mbps with built-in Atheros super-G wireless card. Marked improvement in wireless networking speed. Excellent speed with simple setup.

cont.entity_a: Router itself is fine but box was previously opened and/or router is used. Interchangeable parts are convenient in the shop. Lacks shaft lock for easier loosening and unloosening the collet. Adjusts with a screw dial and locks with lever clamp.
cont.entity_b: Router works but doesn't work properly. Router is excellent for home networking.
Reliable for years, but outdated for modern standards.

cont.entity_a: Easy to control with wood handles. Easy to control and plenty of power. Light weight and easy to control.
cont.entity_b: Router is easy to use. Easy to use and works well.

cont.entity_a: Switch did not work half the time. Power switch failed the second time it was turned on.
cont.entity_b: Some problems setting up wireless network with provided CD. Frustrating at first but smooth sailing once terms are learned.
